quotes.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If life were predictable it would cease to be life, and be without flavor.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of lessons which must be lived to be understood.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life is short, and it is up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life would be tragic if it weren't funny.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.quote: Keep smiling, because life is a beautiful thing and there's so much to smile about.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is what we make it, always has been, always will be.
quotes.author: Grandma Moses

quotes.quote: The big lesson in life, baby, is never be scared of anyone or anything.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Life is ten percent what happens to us and ninety percent how we respond to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Life's tragedy is that we get old too soon and wise too late.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Not how long, but how well you have lived is the main thing.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: If you want to live a happy life, tie it to a goal, not to people or things.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: Live in the sunshine, swim in the sea, drink the wild air.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The purpose of life is to believe, to hope, and to strive.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Life is too important to be taken seriously.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
quotes.author: Matt Cameron

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Life isn’t about waiting for the storm to pass, it’s about learning to dance in the rain.
quotes.author: Vivian Greene

quotes.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.
quotes.author: Sholom Aleichem

quotes.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
quotes.author: Kevin Kruse

quotes.quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one’s courage.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever. Live as if you’ll die today.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Life isn’t measured by the number of breaths you take, but by the moments that take your breath away.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Live for each second without hesitation.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
quotes.author: Joshua J. Marine

quotes.quote: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Only a life lived for others is a life worthwhile.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is made of ever so many partings welded together.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine—and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Life is really about moving on.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: You only pass through this life once; you don’t come back for an encore.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: The true meaning of life is to plant trees, under whose shade you do not expect to sit.
quotes.author: Nelson Henderson

quotes.quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.
quotes.author: Cesare Pavese

quotes.quote: Life is short, and truth works far and lives long: let us then speak the truth.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
quotes.author: David Viscott

quotes.quote: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Love the life you live. Live the life you love.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: Life itself is the most wonderful fairy tale.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The greatest pleasure of life is love.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: When we strive to become better than we are, everything around us becomes better too.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The art of living lies less in eliminating our troubles than growing with them.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: Life is a flower of which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Don't wait. The time will never be just right.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: To live is to suffer, to survive is to find some meaning in the suffering.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don’t get so worked up about things.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: In the end, we only regret the chances we didn’t take.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The longer I live, the more I realize the impact of attitude on life.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Keep calm and carry on.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein
